statements: SELECT * FROM phishing_email_templates ORDER BY template_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT template_name, target_group FROM phishing_email_templates WHERE created_by_user = 'Alice' ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM phishing_email_templates WHERE target_group = 'HR' AND created_by_user = 'Bob';
SELECT * FROM phishing_email_templates WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT template_id, last_updated FROM phishing_email_templates WHERE target_group IN ('Engineering', 'Design') ORDER BY template_id ASC;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM phishing_email_templates WHERE target_group = 'Finance'
SELECT * FROM phishing_email_templates WHERE created_by_user = 'admin' ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT template_name, target_group FROM phishing_email_templates WHERE template_name LIKE '%security%' OR template_name LIKE '%phishing%'
SELECT template_id, template_name, template_content FROM phishing_email_templates WHERE last_updated < '2021-10-01'
SELECT template_name, target_group, created_by_user FROM phishing_email_templates WHERE target_group IN ('HR', 'Marketing') LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM phishing_templates;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM phishing_templates;
SELECT target_email, target_name FROM phishing_targets;
SELECT target_email, template_name FROM phishing_targets JOIN phishing_templates ON phishing_targets.template_id = phishing_templates.template_id;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM phishing_templates WHERE template_name = 'Phishing Template 1';
SELECT * FROM phishing_templates;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM phishing_templates ORDER BY template_name DESC;
SELECT target_id, target_email, target_name FROM phishing_targets WHERE target_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT template_id, template_name, template_content FROM phishing_templates WHERE template_name = 'Welcome Email';
SELECT * FROM phishing_targets JOIN phishing_templates ON phishing_targets.template_id = phishing_templates.template_id;
SELECT * FROM phishing_email_templates;
SELECT id, template_name FROM phishing_email_templates ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT template_name, content FROM phishing_email_templates WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM email_targets WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, email_address FROM email_targets WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM phishing_email_templates;
SELECT id, template_name FROM phishing_email_templates ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT content FROM phishing_email_templates WHERE id = 3;
SELECT email_address, name FROM email_targets WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT t.template_name, et.email_address FROM phishing_email_templates t JOIN template_targets tt ON t.id = tt.template_id JOIN email_targets et ON tt.target_id = et.id;
SELECT * FROM phishing_templates;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM phishing_templates ORDER BY template_name DESC;
SELECT target_name FROM targets WHERE email_address = 'example@example.com';
SELECT * FROM template_mapping WHERE template_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND target_id = '456e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT log_id, sent_timestamp FROM distribution_logs WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY sent_timestamp ASC;
SELECT template_id, template_name, template_content FROM phishing_templates LIMIT 5;

SELECT t1.target_name, t2.email_address, t3.sent_timestamp, t4.delivery_status FROM targets t1, phishing_templates t2, template_mapping t3, distribution_logs t4 WHERE t1.target_id = t3.target_id AND t2.template_id = t3.template_id AND t3.mapping_id = t4.mapping_id;

SELECT template_name, COUNT(*) AS total_targets FROM phishing_templates JOIN template_mapping ON phishing_templates.template_id = template_mapping.template_id GROUP BY template_name ORDER BY total_targets DESC;

SELECT t1.target_name, t2.template_content, t3.sent_timestamp, t4.delivery_status FROM targets t1 INNER JOIN template_mapping t2 ON t1.target_id = t2.target_id INNER JOIN distribution_logs t3 ON t2.mapping_id = t3.mapping_id INNER JOIN phishing_templates t4 ON t2.template_id = t4.template_id;

SELECT t1.target_name, t2.template_name, t3.delivery_status, t4.sent_timestamp FROM targets t1 LEFT JOIN template_mapping t2 ON t1.target_id = t2.target_id LEFT JOIN distribution_logs t3 ON t2.mapping_id = t3.mapping_id LEFT JOIN phishing_templates t4 ON t2.template_id = t4.template_id;
SELECT * FROM phishing_templates;
SELECT template_name, content FROM phishing_templates;
SELECT target_email, target_name FROM targets WHERE target_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM campaigns
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-05-01' AND '2022-06-30'

SELECT campaign_name, template_name FROM campaigns JOIN campaign_templates ON campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_templates.campaign_id JOIN phishing_templates ON campaign_templates.template_id = phishing_templates.template_id

SELECT campaign_name, template_name, content FROM campaigns JOIN campaign_templates ON campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_templates.campaign_id JOIN phishing_templates ON campaign_templates.template_id = phishing_templates.template_id WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%Summer%'
SELECT t.target_id, t.target_email, ct.campaign_id FROM targets t JOIN campaign_templates ct ON t.target_id = ct.template_id
